languages.text: "Мы не жаждем их смерти, не ищем во тьме. Они сами находят нас". {n}Кибелла прикрывает глаза и делает глубокий вдох.{/n} "И мы направляем их в посмертии, если {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}Его священное Таро{/g} укажет, что Император желает принять этих мучеников".

traits.locale_text: "Мы не жаждем их смерти, не ищем во тьме. Они сами находят нас". {n}Кибелла прикрывает глаза и делает глубокий вдох.{/n} "И мы направляем их в посмертии, если {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}Его священное Таро{/g} укажет, что Император желает принять этих мучеников.".

languages.text: "We do not desire their death. We do not seek them out in the darkness. They come to us." {n}Kibellah closes her eyes for a moment. She takes a deep breath.{/n} "And we usher them from this life if {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}His sacred Tarot{/g} reveals that the Emperor wishes to accept these martyrs."
languages.original_text: "Мы не жаждем их смерти, не ищем во тьме. Они сами находят нас". {n}Кибелла прикрывает глаза и делает глубокий вдох.{/n} "И мы направляем их в посмертии, если {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}Его священное Таро{/g} укажет, что Император желает принять этих мучеников".

traits.locale_text: "We do not desire their death. We do not seek them out in the darkness. They find us." {n}Kibellah half-closes her eyes and takes a deep breath.{/n} "And we guide them in the afterlife, as Ahn'shini commands."

"We do not desire their death. We do not seek them out in the darkness. They find us." {n}Kibellah half-closes her eyes and takes a deep breath.{/n} "And we guide them in the afterlife, as Ahn'shini commands."

"We do not desire their death. We do not seek them out in the darkness. They come to us." {n}Kibellah closes her eyes for a moment. She takes a deep breath.{/n} "And we usher them from this life, as Ahn'shini commands."

"We do not desire their death. We do not seek them out in the darkness. They come to us." {n}Kibellah closes her eyes for a moment. She takes a deep breath.{/n} "And we usher them from this life, as Ahn'shini commands."

"We do not desire their death. We do not seek them out in the darkness. They come to us." {n}Kibellah closes her eyes for a moment. She takes a deep breath.{/n} "And we usher them from this life if {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}His sacred Tarot{/g} reveals that the Emperor wishes to accept these martyrs."

"We do not desire their death. We do not seek them out in the darkness. They come to us." {n}Kibellah closes her eyes for a moment. She takes a deep breath.{/n} "And we usher them from this life if {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}His sacred Tarot{/g} reveals that the Emperor wishes to accept these martyrs."

languages.text: « Nous ne souhaitons pas leur mort. Nous ne les traquons pas dans les ténèbres. Ils viennent à nous. » {n}Kibellah ferme les yeux un instant avant d'inspirer profondément.{/n} « Et nous les congédions de cette vie lorsque {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}Son tarot sacré{/g} nous révèle que l'Empereur est prêt à les accepter. »
languages.original_text: "We do not desire their death. We do not seek them out in the darkness. They come to us." {n}Kibellah closes her eyes for a moment. She takes a deep breath.{/n} "And we usher them from this life if {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}His sacred Tarot{/g} reveals that the Emperor wishes to accept these martyrs."

traits.locale_text: « Nous ne souhaitons pas leur mort. Nous ne les traquons pas dans les ténèbres. Ils viennent à nous. » {n}Kibellah ferme les yeux un instant avant d'inspirer profondément.{/n} « Et nous les congédions de cette vie lorsque {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}Son tarot sacré{/g} nous révèle que l'Empereur est prêt à les accepter. »

languages.text: «No deseamos su muerte. No los buscamos en las sombras. Son ellos quienes acuden a nosotros». {n}Kibellah cierra los ojos durante un momento y respira hondo.{/n} «Y nosotros los liberamos de esta vida si {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}Su tarot sagrado{/g} revela que el Emperador desea aceptar a estos mártires».
languages.original_text: "We do not desire their death. We do not seek them out in the darkness. They come to us." {n}Kibellah closes her eyes for a moment. She takes a deep breath.{/n} "And we usher them from this life if {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}His sacred Tarot{/g} reveals that the Emperor wishes to accept these martyrs."

traits.locale_text: «No deseamos su muerte. No los buscamos en las sombras. Son ellos quienes acuden a nosotros». {n}Kibellah cierra los ojos durante un momento y respira hondo.{/n} «Y nosotros los liberamos de esta vida si {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}Su tarot sagrado{/g} revela que el Emperador desea aceptar a estos mártires».

languages.text: “我们并不渴求他们的死亡。我们并不会在黑暗中找到他们，而是他们主动找到我们。”{n}绮贝菈闭上眼睛，深吸了一口气。{/n}“如果{g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}祂的圣牌{/g}表明，祂愿意接受这些殉道者，那我们就会送那些人前往彼岸。”
languages.original_text: "We do not desire their death. We do not seek them out in the darkness. They come to us." {n}Kibellah closes her eyes for a moment. She takes a deep breath.{/n} "And we usher them from this life if {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}His sacred Tarot{/g} reveals that the Emperor wishes to accept these martyrs."

traits.locale_text: “我们并不渴求他们的死亡。我们并不会在黑暗中找到他们，而是他们主动找到我们。”{n}绮贝菈闭上眼睛，深吸了一口气。{/n}“如果{g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}祂的圣牌{/g}表明，祂愿意接受这些殉道者，那我们就会送那些人前往彼岸。”

languages.text: 「私たちは彼らの死を望んでいません。暗闇を望んでいません。彼ら自らが私たちにやってくるのです」{n}キベラは一瞬だけ目を閉じ、深い息をすった。{/n}「そして、殉教者を受け入れるという皇帝の望みを{g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}皇帝の聖なるタロット{/g}が明かせば、私たちは彼らをこの世から追い出すのです」
languages.original_text: "We do not desire their death. We do not seek them out in the darkness. They come to us." {n}Kibellah closes her eyes for a moment. She takes a deep breath.{/n} "And we usher them from this life if {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}His sacred Tarot{/g} reveals that the Emperor wishes to accept these martyrs."

traits.locale_text: 「私たちは彼らの死を望んでいません。暗闇を望んでいません。彼ら自らが私たちにやってくるのです」{n}キベラは一瞬だけ目を閉じ、深い息をすった。{/n}「そして、殉教者を受け入れるという皇帝の望みを{g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}皇帝の聖なるタロット{/g}が明かせば、私たちは彼らをこの世から追い出すのです」

languages.text: "Wir wünschen ihren Tod nicht. Wir suchen sie nicht in der Dunkelheit. Sie kommen zu uns." {n}Kibellah schließt kurz die Augen. Sie atmet tief durch.{/n} "Und wir geleiten sie aus diesem Leben, wenn {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}Sein heiliges Tarot{/g} offenbart, dass der Imperator diese Märtyrer zu empfangen wünscht."
languages.original_text: "We do not desire their death. We do not seek them out in the darkness. They come to us." {n}Kibellah closes her eyes for a moment. She takes a deep breath.{/n} "And we usher them from this life if {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}His sacred Tarot{/g} reveals that the Emperor wishes to accept these martyrs."

traits.locale_text: "Wir wünschen ihren Tod nicht. Wir suchen sie nicht in der Dunkelheit. Sie kommen zu uns." {n}Kibellah schließt kurz die Augen. Sie atmet tief durch.{/n} "Und wir geleiten sie aus diesem Leben, wenn {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}Sein heiliges Tarot{/g} offenbart, dass der Imperator diese Märtyrer zu empfangen wünscht."

languages.original_text: "We do not desire their death. We do not seek them out in the darkness. They come to us." {n}Kibellah closes her eyes for a moment. She takes a deep breath.{/n} "And we usher them from this life if His sacred Tarot reveals that the Emperor wishes to accept these martyrs."

languages.text: "Ölmelerini biz arzu etmiyoruz. Karanlıkta onları arayıp bulmuyoruz. Onlar bizi buluyor." {n}Kibellah, bir anlığına gözlerini yumuyor. Derin bir nefes alıyor.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}İmparator'un kutsal Tarotu{/g}, O'nun bu şehitleri kabul eylemek istediğini belli ettiğinde bu hayata gözlerini yummalarına yardım ediyoruz."
languages.original_text: "We do not desire their death. We do not seek them out in the darkness. They come to us." {n}Kibellah closes her eyes for a moment. She takes a deep breath.{/n} "And we usher them from this life if {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}His sacred Tarot{/g} reveals that the Emperor wishes to accept these martyrs."
